# go list should not report SWIG-generated C++ files in CompiledGoFiles.

[!exec:swig] skip

# CompiledGoFiles should contain 4 files:
#  a.go
#  a.swigcxx.go
#  _cgo_gotypes.go
#  a.cgo1.go

go list -f '{{.CompiledGoFiles}}' -compiled=true example/swig

# These names we see here will be from the build cache, so we just
# count them. Four files: three spaces.
stdout -count=3 ' '

-- go.mod --
module example

go 1.16

-- swig/a.go --
package swig

-- swig/a.swigcxx --
